name: Happily Ever After (itch)
description:
Happily Ever After is a (very) short fantasy game about living happily ever after.

Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD to move; Space or E or or Enter to interact.

Created as part of a game-a-week challenge for the prompt, "10 seconds or less," during the week of August 19th, 2018.  If it's too happy for your tastes, you should check out You Are Dead, the other game I made for the week.

Optimized to run at 1920x1080 (should work at other resolutions, but there might be issues).
